x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/visionprescription-example.json curl --location --request PUT 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/VisionPrescription/VisionPrescription-example \' --header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \ --data-raw '{"resourceType":"VisionPrescription","id":"33123","text":{"status":"generated","div":"
\n\t\t\t

OD -2.00 SPH +2.00 add 0.5 p.d. BD

\n\t\t\t

OS -1.00 -0.50 x 180 +2.00 add 0.5 p.d. BU

\n\t\t
"},"identifier":[{"system":"http://www.happysight.com/prescription","value":"VPulx7lLxjchanGxeUE"}],"status":"active","created":"2014-06-15","patient":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"dateWritten":"2014-06-15","prescriber":{"reference":"Practitioner/example"},"lensSpecification":[{"product":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/ex-visionprescriptionproduct","code":"lens"}]},"eye":"right","sphere":-2,"prism":[{"amount":0.5,"base":"down"}],"add":2},{"product":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/ex-visionprescriptionproduct","code":"lens"}]},"eye":"left","sphere":-1,"cylinder":-0.5,"axis":180,"prism":[{"amount":0.5,"base":"up"}],"add":2}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"s10Pnyomjw0"}]}}'

parameters.name: datewritten
parameters.description: Return prescriptions written on this date

parameters.name: encounter
parameters.description: Return prescriptions with this encounter identifier

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Return prescriptions with this external identifier

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The identity of a patient to list dispenses for

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the vision prescription
